pretest.question: 1. Why is it important to know and understand skin tone?

choice.a: a.It is for the individual to match hairdo.
choice.b: b.It is important for the selection of foundation color.
choice.c: c.It is important for medical issues.
choice.d: d.It is not at all important.

pretest.question: 2.What is the most important tool for makeup?

choice.a: a.Brush
choice.b: b.Powder
choice.c: c.Foundation
choice.d: d.Lipstick

pretest.question: 3. What is shimmer powder used for?

choice.a: a.It is to make your face brighter.
choice.b: b.It is to cover the scars and wrinkles.
choice.c: c.It is to free your skin from dust.
choice.d: d.It is to stabilize the skin tone.

pretest.question: 4. How many types of knot are there for tying necktie?
5. Which of the following are considered warm colors?

choice.a: a.Yellow, blue, and purple
choice.b: b.Orange, yellow, and purple
choice.c: c.Green, yellow, and purple
choice.d: d.Blue, green, and purple

pretest.question: 6. What is the meaning of business casual attire?

choice.a: a.A business outfit
choice.b: b.A less formal attire, professional enough to be office appropriate
choice.c: c.A formal attire, professional enough to be office appropriate
choice.d: d.A business attire used for casual occasion

pretest.question: 7. Which shade of concealer best hides dark circles under a person’s eyes?

choice.a: a.A concealer having the same shade as his/her skin
choice.b: b.A concealer having one shade lighter than the person’s skin
choice.c: c.A multi-purpose concealer which will conceal on all types of face
choice.d: d.A concealer having one shade darker than the person’s skin

pretest.question: 8.What colors should not be worn on the day of job interview?

choice.a: a.Black and white
choice.b: b.White and neon colors
choice.c: c.Pastel colors
choice.d: d.Blue and navy blue

pretest.question: 9. What is the proper posture?

choice.a: a.Sitting with crossed legs
choice.b: b.Sitting with feet on the floor and straight back
choice.c: c.Sitting with feet on the floor with leaning back
choice.d: d.Sitting with eyes looking at objects with precaution

pretest.question: 10.Which of the following is a proper gesture?

choice.a: a.Looking at the opposite party with eye contact
choice.b: b.Folding of arms
choice.c: c.Keeping hands to yourself
choice.d: d.Talking with hand gestures

pretest.question: 11.What is a lip liner used for?

choice.a: a.It is a lip pencil used to fill in uneven areas on the outer edges of the lips.
choice.b: b.It is a lipstick which is used to make small lines around the lips.
choice.c: c.It is a cosmetic which is used to nourish the lips.
choice.d: d.It is a lip pencil used to draw the desired shape.

pretest.question: 12. If inside the interview room, the interviewer asks you a question that you don’t know the answer, what is the most appropriate way to deal with it?

choice.a: a.Be honest, admit that you don’t know the answer and say that if you get a chance, you will find out about the issue.
choice.b: b.Be honest, admit that you don’t know the answer but make your best guess regarding the issue.
choice.c: c.Think of the best possible answer that is related to the question and answer.
choice.d: d.Ask permission to change the question .

pretest.question: 13. Which of the following is the technique to make yourself look thinner?

choice.a: a.Choosing clothes one size bigger.
choice.b: b.Choosing clothes which emphasize your chest and hips
choice.c: c.Choosing clothes with big patterns to make yourself look thinner
choice.d: .Choosing clothes coming from department stores with standard sizes

pretest.question: 14. What is the purpose of putting on foundation?

choice.a: a.It is used as base color for your body.
choice.b: b.It is a kind of moisturizer used to nourish the skin before putting on makeup.
choice.c: c.It is a skin-colored makeup applied to the face to create an even, uniform color to cover flaws.
choice.d: d.It is a skin-colored makeup intended to change the texture of the skin.

pretest.question: 15. Which of the following is the best option in choosing an outfit for a job interview?

choice.a: a.Buy an expensive and branded outfit.
choice.b: b.Buy an outfit according to modern fashion.
choice.c: c.Analyze your body shape and find the outfit style that matches you most.
choice.d: d.Get an outfit made by the tailor

pretest.question: 16. What kind of shoes should you wear for a job interview?

choice.a: a.Fashionable high heels
choice.b: b.Shoes with high heels to make your body slim with good posture.
choice.c: c.Polished, dark, solid-colored shoes with approximately 2.5-inch heels
choice.d: d.The shoes that provide the most comfort to your feet to give you confidence

pretest.question: 17. Which of the following is true about job interview preparation?

choice.a: a.The interviewee should enroll in a pre-job interview tutorial class.
choice.b: b.The interviewee should get at least 6-8 hours of sleep the night prior to the interview.
choice.c: c.The interviewee should drink plenty of water before entering the interview room.
choice.d: d.The interviewee should put on as much as perfume and makeup on the day of the interview in order to impress the interviewers.

pretest.question: 18. Which of the following is considered a bad example of an outfit?

choice.a: a.Shoes with laces
choice.b: b.A collarless shirt with short sleeves.
choice.c: c.A neck-tie with repeating patterns
choice.d: d.Socks with mid-calf length

pretest.question: 19. What is the thing that the interviewer should bring to the interview room apart from men’s briefcase or lady’s handbag?

choice.a: a.The interviewer should not bring anything.
choice.b: b.Mobile phone
choice.c: c.Several copies of the resume
choice.d: d.Bottled water

pretest.question: 20.Which of the following accessory/ries should the interviewer have with him as he enters the interview cite?

choice.a: a.Pen, calculator, and personal documents
choice.b: b.A pen only
choice.c: c.A handbag only
choice.d: d.Personal documents only

posttest.question: 1. Liquid foundation is one of the most popular types of foundation.  What is the main advantage of a liquid foundation?

choice.a: a.It is available everywhere with cheap price.
choice.b: b.It provides the heaviest coverage to the face.
choice.c: c.It can be used with all skin types.
choice.d: d.It can be removed easily and leaves little stain.

posttest.question: 2. What is the main drawback of ‘matte lipstick?’

choice.a: a.It becomes dry and usually needs to be used with gloss.
choice.b: b.It does not last long like other types of lipstick.
choice.c: c.It lacks variety of colors.
choice.d: d.It is not popular among users because of its price.

posttest.question: 3. As an interviewee sits inside the interview room, what should the interviewee do with his/her hands?

choice.a: a.Always keep both hands on the lap
choice.b: b.Cross the arms in order to keep him/herself warm
choice.c: c.Keep the hands on the sides
choice.d: d.Hold each hand firmly to indicate confirmation

posttest.question: 4. Which of the following is a good example of a positive greeting?

choice.a: a.Greet the opposite party with local language
choice.b: b.Greet the opposite party with a firm handshake with a verbal greeting in English
choice.c: c.Greet the opposite party with a nod
choice.d: d.Greet the opposite party with a wave and a verbal greeting in English

posttest.question: 5. Which is the best place to test a foundation?

choice.a: a.Directly on the face
choice.b: b.On the person’s backhand
choice.c: c.On the person’s palm
choice.d: d.On the person’s neck

posttest.question: 6. What is the correct way to choose a foundation?

choice.a: a.A person should choose a natural light foundation.
choice.b: b.A person should have another makeup on while choosing a new foundation.
choice.c: c.A person should make use of a mirror when choosing a foundation
choice.d: d.A person should rely on the help of the store’s specialist in order to choose the correct foundation.

posttest.question: 7. What colors should be worn on the day of job interview?

choice.a: a.Colors that match the individual’s personality
choice.b: b.Colors that belong to the interviewer’s company
choice.c: c.Soft colors
choice.d: d.Warm colors

posttest.question: 8. What is the accessory needed to be worn on the day of job interview?

choice.a: a.wrist watch
choice.b: b.bangles
choice.c: c.clutch
choice.d: d.bracelet

posttest.question: 9. What is the recommended hair style for job interview?

choice.a: a.A person can look professional by keeping the hair up and out of the face.
choice.b: b.A person can keep his or her confidence by going to the interview with usual hair style.
choice.c: c.A person can put styling gel and heavy spray in order to keep the hair from falling.
choice.d: d.A person can make a fashionable hairdo to look in trend.

posttest.question: 10. What is the best way to prepare for a job interview?

choice.a: a.The person must practice by speaking in front of the mirror the frequently asked questions.
choice.b: b.The person must consult experts for information.
choice.c: c.The person must participate in a tutorial class.
choice.d: d.The person must study and memorize details about the interviewers’ company.

posttest.question: 11. In order to keep makeup last for the whole day, which kind of powder must you use?

choice.a: a.Loose powder
choice.b: b.Pressed powder
choice.c: c.Two way cake powder
choice.d: d.Setting powder

posttest.question: 12. Which of the following is the technique to make yourself look taller?

choice.a: a.By wearing an outfit with one color
choice.b: b.By wearing an outfit with multi-colors
choice.c: c.By wearing shoes with big heels
choice.d: d.By wearing big outfits

posttest.question: 13. Which of the following is considered a ‘must not do’ in the interview room?

choice.a: a.Say thank you every time you are finished with your answer.
choice.b: b.Ask the interviewers to repeat the questions twice to make sure you understand well
choice.c: c.Write down notes on your palms in order to keep the answers near to you.
choice.d: d.Say sorry when you miss hearing something or did not hear the interviewer.

posttest.question: 14. Which is not a way to help improve a person’s posture?

choice.a: a.Take standing breaks when he/she has to sit for a long time.
choice.b: b.Sleep flat on his/her back
choice.c: c.Rely on high heels to help when walking
choice.d: d.Make adjustment on the chair she/he has to work in

posttest.question: 15. Which is/are not a way/ways to make a person look younger with makeup?

choice.a: a.Putting on lighter shade of lipsticks
choice.b: b.Covering up eye circles by putting concealer and adding brighter shades of eye shadow to the eyes
choice.c: c.Shaping eyebrows with thicker volume
choice.d: d.Putting highlights and shimmer on the cheeks

posttest.question: 16. In which occasion is a lip gloss suitable?

choice.a: a.When attending a party at night
choice.b: b.When wearing casual outfit on an easy going day
choice.c: c.When attending an interview
choice.d: d.When a person is about to attend an appointment with a client

posttest.question: 17. For basic knowledge regarding the skin, what is the meaning of melanin?

choice.a: a.It is the substance that makes a person improves his sleep at night.
choice.b: b.It is the pigment found in skill cells.
choice.c: c.It is the color of the cells in a person’s skin.
choice.d: d.It is the body’s protective layer of the skin.

posttest.question: 18. What is a team assessment?

choice.a: a.It is an exercise used to evaluate a team’s strengths and weaknesses
choice.b: b.It is a tool used to calculate the team’s ability to perform
choice.c: c.It is a kind of training done after job recruitment
choice.d: d.It is an indicator of the individual’s and team’s performance

posttest.question: 19. What is the meaning of ‘arm reach test’ in an airline examination?

choice.a: a.The airline measures your arm span for work purpose
choice.b: b.The airline tests the recruit’s ability to reach the minimum limit of the given airline.
choice.c: c.It is the measurement of the person’s arm length.
choice.d: d.It is the measurement of the person’s flexibility.

posttest.question: 20. Which of the following gives additional marks for a person participating in an airline job interview?

choice.a: a.The accessories that he/she wears
choice.b: b.The person’s educational background
choice.c: c.The person’s foreign language proficiency
choice.d: d.The person’s physical ability
